site.description: This is the Eclipse RSS Reader Update Site. If you are an Eclipse 2.1.x user, point your Update Manager at http://morphine.sourceforge.net/updates and select the desired Eclipse RSS Reader features to download. If you are an Eclipse 3.x user, add the same URL as a new Remote Site when searching for new features to install.

category-def.name: default
category-def.label: Eclipse RSS Reader 1.x
category-def.description: Eclipse RSS Reader for Eclipse 2.1 and compatible.
